ValidationRule.description: once a case is created the score cannot be altered by anyone other than a system admin
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: $Profile.Name <>"System Administrator"&&( (ISCHANGED(Legal_Corp_Directive__c )|| ISCHANGED(External_Impact_Volume__c )|| ISCHANGED(External_Impact_Severity__c ) || ISCHANGED(External_Impact_Frequency__c )|| ISCHANGED(Internal_Impact_Volume__c ) || ISCHANGED(Internal_Impact_Frequency__c )|| ISCHANGED(Internal_Impact_Severity__c) || ISCHANGED(Internal_Savings__c)|| ISCHANGED(Revenue__c)|| ISCHANGED(Risk__c))&& NOT(ISBLANK( CreatedDate )))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Once a case is created the score cannot be modified. Please contact your SPOC if the score needs to be changed.
